newsitem.title: UK: British customs seize record cocaine haul.
newsitem.headline: British customs seize record cocaine haul.

text.p: British customs officers at London's Heathrow airport on Monday seized 180 kilos (400 lb) of cocaine with a street value of 30 million pounds ($45 million) hidden in a container of cut flowers.
It was Britain's biggest drugs haul this year and the largest ever at Heathrow.
Unusually, the drugs were not found as the result of a targeted operation, but in a routine search by a sniffer dog of one of the holds on a passenger flight from South America.
A Customs spokesman said: "We feel very happy about this one now. It's an awful lot of cocaine which will not be hitting the streets."
